reviews.review_msg: Lectures felt somewhat unnecessary because too much time was spent trying to engage with the large class of 250+ people and you did not need all the presented information to do well on the assignments (just do the readings and come to tutorial with some of your own analysis). I did like Professor Levy's unique assignments though!!

Bloated, unsubstantial lectures. His class was a huge waste of my time, money and energy! It didn't seem like he put much work into having material to teach, but hey all the poets were his friends so why not just get them on Zoom instead of working? In nearly every lecture there were maybe 5-10 minutes of material. So disappointed and angry!

dr collins is a fantastic lecturer. i had a TA so i am not sure how he grades but he is really understanding, since he moved the deadlines back for several of our assignments. very nice guy, great lectures, cool class overall
